name: Dots and Circles
description:
Concept

Be a Dot! Be a Circle! Be anything you want, just avoid what you are not! Collect as many bullets as you can and see how much you score!

Description and Instructions:

Dots and Circles is an expertimenal Bullet Hell game that uses mouse as movement. Collect as many bullets as you can to see how much you can score!

  • Move around with the mouse
  • Left click to change between being a Dot or a Circle.

Feel free to give feedback or report bugs in the comments!

Dev comments

This game and its engine is written from scratch in 'handmade' fashion. Almost everything is coded from ground up in C/C++ for reasons mostly educational.

The only code not written by me are are renderer APIs, OS APIs, a couple of stb and standard library headers. 

The idea for this game comes from my freshmen student project back in university. I felt that the idea is simple enough to be a proof of concept for an engine I'm writing from scratch.

Alas I must move on to other projects, but if for some reason this gets popular enough, I will consider adding more features as well as porting it to other platforms. We'll see!

Credits

Programming, art and sound by me, momodevelop.

TTF and image loading code from stb.

Special thanks for the Handmade Hero movement for motivating and inspiring me to start all this. It was a wonderful mind expanding experience.
